name: PrintingModeWidthCalculation
description: Defines if the provided width should define the total width of the string, or the widths of each character within that string
macros: #[derive(PartialEq, Eq, Hash, Clone, Copy, Serialize, Deserialize)]

content.name: Filling
content.description: Provided width should define the width of the entire string

content.name: Absolute
content.description: Provided width should define the width of each character
